name: Save new RD Station leads to Google Sheets
description: Every time a new lead is created via RD Station API, Make will automatically save it to Google Sheets. This template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1I1BWeGqy_-wcI5jbWqTzNkIP_uy3PdD9wZAZ-nU5TUY/edit#gid=0).
